Subject: Updating order.xml as new releases are made

I have a stored profile that I use for all of my crawls that contains
the elaborate (well, that may be an overstatement, but I do tweak a
lot of nobs and add filters and such) settings used. How well does the
current HEAD deal with being handed an order file that may not be
up-to-date with it's current settings?

In other words, is there a clean upgrading path, or should I just
recreate the profile from scratch?

Note that I'm being lazy and not trying it...

    -tree
